    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerStats

        public PlayerStats(java.util.UUID _playerUUID,
           java.lang.String _gameName)
        Creates a new (blank, everything = 0) player stats object. To get updated stats use DatabaseManager.getPlayerStats(UUID, String)
        Parameters:
        _playerUUID - The UUID of the player whose stats you wish to get.
        _gameName - The name of the game the stats are from.
